üìù Usage

To capture screenshots for any scenario, use:

npx pre-post \
  "file://$(pwd)/{scenario}/before.html" \
  "file://$(pwd)/{scenario}/after.html" \
  -c

Replace {scenario} with the scenario name from the table above.
